e4ff1712-90cc-47cd-a392-023da13bff56.name: Bad Sight (Farsighted)
e4ff1712-90cc-47cd-a392-023da13bff56.notes: -6 to Vision rolls to spot items within 1 yd; -3 DX to any close manual task, including close combat

efa1edfc-91bd-40dd-bba0-0da1c1debe47.name: Bad Sight (Nearsighted)
efa1edfc-91bd-40dd-bba0-0da1c1debe47.notes: -6 to Vision rolls to spot items more than 1 yd away; -2 to all melee attacks; double actual distance to the target when calculating the range modifier for ranged attacks

features.situation: from those attracted to members of your sex, +2 from everyone else
from those attracted to members of your sex, +2 from everyone else

22f26a04-4fd0-405c-a160-ffa78a356fdb.name: Off-the-Shelf Looks
22f26a04-4fd0-405c-a160-ffa78a356fdb.notes: Halves the usual reaction bonus - adjust manually

features.situation: from those attracted to members of your sex, +2 from everyone else. Exception: Members of the same sex with reason to dislike you (more than -4 in reaction penalties regardless of bonuses) resent your good looks and react at -2 instead.

from those attracted to members of your sex, +2 from everyone else. Exception: Members of the same sex with reason to dislike you (more than -4 in reaction penalties regardless of bonuses) resent your good looks and react at -2 instead.

from those attracted to members of your sex, +2 from everyone else. Exception: Members of the same sex with reason to dislike you (more than -4 in reaction penalties regardless of bonuses) resent your good looks and react at -2 instead.

c1b88b87-c759-48b5-8572-6e3c6810ecb6.name: Impulsiveness
c1b88b87-c759-48b5-8572-6e3c6810ecb6.notes: Make a self-control roll whenever it would be wise to wait and ponder. If you fail, you must act

ce47a755-07dc-4340-9a33-e7d83f964080.name: Short Attention Span
ce47a755-07dc-4340-9a33-e7d83f964080.notes: Make a self-control roll whenever you must maintain interest in something for an extended period of time, or whenever a distraction is offered. If you fail, you automatically fail at the task at hand.

5547c95a-4b41-476e-bb42-3a2141d96e6a.name: Mild Shyness
5547c95a-4b41-476e-bb42-3a2141d96e6a.notes: You are uneasy with strangers, especially assertive or attractive ones.

82259e97-c690-428a-8d83-28af26934a17.name: Severe Shyness
82259e97-c690-428a-8d83-28af26934a17.notes: You are very uncomfortable around strangers, and tend to be quiet even among friends.

203a1481-20af-4ad4-abff-ff3db664da39.name: -20 points from other selection or following:

4241725e-c576-43d8-aff1-a1b2c089292c.name: Greed
4241725e-c576-43d8-aff1-a1b2c089292c.notes: Make a self-control roll any time riches are offered – as payment for fair work, gains from adventure, spoils of crime, or just bait. If you fail, you do whatever it takes to get the payoff.

features.situation: toward those you are jealous of (may be as much as -4, at GM's discretion)

71f0f924-6c0f-465f-a9f7-fb18769fdd07.name: Low Self-Image
71f0f924-6c0f-465f-a9f7-fb18769fdd07.notes: -3 to all skill rolls whenever you believe that the odds are against you or others expect you to fail (GM’s judgment).

features.situation: from others in any situation where No Sense of Humor becomes evident

1712aeed-afbc-49f2-9783-6e20aae3d104.name: Post-Combat Shakes
1712aeed-afbc-49f2-9783-6e20aae3d104.notes: Make a self-control roll at the end of any battle. If you fail, roll 3d, add the amount by which you failed your self-control roll, and look up the result on the Fright Check Table.

a9a296e4-2870-43ee-bd6d-6cab8b01eda7.name: Combat Reflexes
a9a296e4-2870-43ee-bd6d-6cab8b01eda7.notes: Never freeze; +6 on all IQ rolls to wake up or to recover from surprise or mental stun; Your side gets +1 to initiative rolls (+2 if you're the leader)

f7c7ac6e-aca2-4fe4-bf6d-bb1efdd7607f.name: Can obtain information using supernatural talents

84143596-bdb6-4485-a30d-b949cb387648.name: Can obtain information using supernatural talents

2f009f1d-d75c-4901-9b8d-028b1015ecae.name: Can obtain information using supernatural talents

e2d35bec-faa2-49c9-b850-f654a4a1aa9f.name: Can obtain information using supernatural talents

53ac5b5f-3f5f-469d-926c-85b32c8ed270.name: Can obtain information using supernatural talents

83fe5779-bc34-4aae-be7f-a9b28efba692.name: Can obtain information using supernatural talents

509db1b7-ce7b-489d-9ab4-53a92734b0ef.name: Unfazeable
509db1b7-ce7b-489d-9ab4-53a92734b0ef.notes: Exempt from fright checks. Reaction modifiers do not affect you.

7144020f-c8d0-46d1-9346-e00440b3d0ca.name: High Pain Threshold
7144020f-c8d0-46d1-9346-e00440b3d0ca.notes: Never suffer shock penalties when injured; +3 on all HT rolls to avoid knockdown and stunning; +3 to resist torture

660921b6-f7a5-4bbb-aaea-9141ab3268d2.name: Luck
660921b6-f7a5-4bbb-aaea-9141ab3268d2.notes: Usable once per hour of play

2a159bd1-434b-47d4-8931-b1a6d0bec563.name: @Who: Individual with twice the PC's starting points@

294be537-97d5-40be-9138-7b149ebdad93.name: @Who: Organization with assets of at least 10000 times starting wealth@

ba0ddabf-c7de-4d2a-aef5-83881c092410.name: @Who: Organization with assets of at least 100000 times starting wealth@

9de99cab-70b9-4eb4-880b-e9ffe1077058.name: Equipment
9de99cab-70b9-4eb4-880b-e9ffe1077058.notes: @Equipment worth no more than average starting wealth@

306649ed-f32b-41ba-bc4c-58d678ca8bdb.name: Equipment
306649ed-f32b-41ba-bc4c-58d678ca8bdb.notes: @Equipment worth more than average starting wealth@

4f8bb43b-58a3-45b2-a4fa-4c1d7a0a2df5.name: Special Abilities
4f8bb43b-58a3-45b2-a4fa-4c1d7a0a2df5.notes: @Magical powers in a non-magical world, higher TL equipment, grants special powers or is supernatural@

5e20572a-bfa1-4847-8eae-405825102ba5.name: Versatile
5e20572a-bfa1-4847-8eae-405825102ba5.notes: +1 on any task that requires creativity or invention, including most rolls against Artist skill and all Engineer rolls for new inventions

9fb8fabd-7391-4441-aaa9-5e2e4160a380.name: Two points in another ranged weapon
